Summary: I visited Irvine for a five day business trip and i have to say.... my experience was amazing thanks to Michael!! He helped me with every concern and question i had throughout my stay!! He knows the answer to every question and makes sure to solve a problem in a timely manner. We need more people like Michael who have such professionalism and are extremely welcoming and friendly! Thanks Michael!!
Manager Response: Steela N,  Thank you for the great review. Our New Hotel is perfect for the modern business traveler as we have removed the unnecessary and focus on the necessary. Michael has incredible engagement with our guests; he enjoys curating a guest experience to ensure your stay is memorable.  We will celebrate this review with him.   ¡Salud!    Paul

Summary: AC hotel these past couple of days and Michael Williams was absolutely wonderful he helped us out every single chance he got he is always nice kind and what the nice warm smile he is an amazing employee. He is also very very gorgeous
Manager Response: lilit818,  Thank you for taking time to provide a review about our new hotel and the service you received. Michael loves engaging with our guests and is an amazing ambassador of AC Hotel. We will be sure to celebrate this review with him.  ¡Salud!    Paul

Summary: I was craving popcorn and Michael was of great help to me. He is very welcoming and his smile is contagious. I admired the way he described his day as "marvelous" as guests walked in. Love this hotel, especially the water bottle fillers on each floor level. Thank you! I will be sure to recommend and return!
Manager Response: carocj72,  Thank you for sharing the "marvelous" experience you had with Michael. I am glad you enjoyed our "hydration stations" on the guest floors. Having a carafe of cold filtered water by your bed side is like being at home. Plus no need to purchase bottled water!  Look forward to your return and future recommendation.  ¡Salud!    Paul

Summary Heading: 3rd time - parking is less than ideal
Summary: Third time I have stayed at the AC.  Love the hotel but the parking is less than ideal. You park in a structure across the street from the hotel. Parking for hotel is on second floor so I had to haul my roller and backpack down the stairs and through the bushes to cross the street to walk to the hotel. Why not have Executive Platinum reserved parking like Hilton does for Diamond Honors members?  If I wanted that much exercise I wouldn't have gone to the gym this morning!    Hotel it is great. Great gym, breakfast comfortable room. Parking just is not ideal.
Manager Response: PJ H,  Thank you for return visits, we have now been open 14 weeks and you choosing our hotel three times already is a sincere complement. I am glad you found the hotel great and enjoy our gym and breakfast. I do value your feedback and how the parking was not ideal. We do welcome guests to use the 15-minute registration spaces to drop any luggage upon check-in and check-out.   I hope we will continue to see you when your travels return you to Irvine.   ¡Salud!    Paul

Summary: I've traveled around the world and this hotel is definitely among the TOP best customer service! Namely Michael Williams! The hotel is very chic and modern. Perfect location - there is a plaza with great restaurants, gym and grocery store. They also host fun events such as trivia night, connect four in the lobby.
Manager Response: Carina L,   Thank you for your five star review! I am glad you liked our new chic and modern styled hotel. We just added Trivia Night on Thursdays and our guests are loving a little competition in the AC Lounge.   As you pointed out, our proximity to so many great business's like the restaurants, bars, and health food grocery store give our guests so many options.  ¡Salud!    Paul

Summary Heading: Great Service from when you open the door
Summary: I recently have been staying in many hotel due to construction at my home.. this hotel in particular stuck out to me. From the moment i checked in I was  given a  warm welcome  and treated with great care. its been very stress full going from hotel to hotel  but the AC hotels  staff member  Michael Williams , truly took hospitality to the roof. He was very helpfully  making sure my family and I were very comfortable  and  happy  checking us inn to our rooms and familiarizing us with the hotel making us feel we were at home. Great Hotel , Great Staff,. i want to givesThanks again  to michael and the rest of the staff for all there help making us feel at home
Manager Response: hsoilluv13,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review; I understand how a home construction project can be so chaotic at times. Its great Michael received you to our hotel with such care. I am delighted the team made you feel at home during your stay.  ¡Salud!    Paul

Summary Heading: Awesome stay in a sleek, modern hotel!
Summary: Comfy beds, sleek/modern room and hotel, great amenities, nice European breakfast, friendly front desk staff! Great location, you can walk across street to eat yummy food at North Italia, The Counter, Ruth's Chris, Which Wich.
Manager Response: Keri33_9,  Thank you for your five-star review. Our European inspired breakfast is “food that fuels your day”. I personally can’t get enough of the sliced prosciutto and French baked daily croissants. As you pointed out we have so many dining options on our campus it’s hard to choose which one to enjoy. The food market ”Mother’s” has an amazing juice bar with sandwiches also.  Hope you will be back to our new hotel soon,  ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary: Missed my connection flying American airlines and they booked this hotel for me for 2 nights. The rooms are big, the staff is really friendly and helpful. This is what you want when staying at a hotel. Couldn't wish for a better stay
Manager Response: Jasper91,   Thank you for the five-star review. I am sorry you had trouble with your flight; but we are glad you landed with us. Traveling can provide friction but we are glad we could remove some of that with our friendly and helpful staff.   We hope you return on a future visit and it does not include a missed connection.  ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary: I am normally a Courtyard Marriott loyalist, but thought I'd try the new AC Hotel for something new.  Have to say - I will be staying at AC going forward!!!  It was modern - but not museum-like.  It was very intuitive for the every day traveler having USB ports conveniently located next to the bed, and a well thought out room, closet, bathroom for ease of traveling.  For families that want to unpack at the hotel, there isn't a dresser so just a heads up if you don't mind staying out of a suitcase.
Manager Response: Shoemom3,  Thank you for your review and Marriott loyalty. I am glad you took the opportunity to try something new and you enjoyed your stay. Our rooms are modern in style and yet functional in so many ways, this resonates with our guests, as it did also with you.   We look forward to your stays in the future, welcome to the AC family.   ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary: Michael is a great employee and does nothing but offer great customer service to everyone he encounters. When we came into the hotel, we didn't really have much of a plan on what we could do in Irvine, but Michael quickly gave us tips on where we could go and what there is to do in the area.
Manager Response: Thadocster,  Thank you for your five-star review. Our associates love to recommend the new hot spots and hidden treasures of Irvine and beyond. I am glad Michael was impact-full during your stay in our new hotel.   I hope in future travels we can curate new options for your time in Irvine.  ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary: I received great customer service from Gabriela & Michael in my stay here in Irvine. We are not from the area and have experienced nothing but great hospitality and tips on things we can do while we are staying in the area.
Manager Response: buckthagenius,  Thank you for the review, our associates love sharing all the incredible things Irvine has to offer. We are in the heart of Irvine surrounded by top restaurants and lifestyle experiences. We have many guests that use our new hotel as hub to all that Orange County has to offer.  We welcome you back to experience more and hear what things you are interested in.  ¡Salud!    Paul

Summary: The Service we received at the AC Hotel in Irvine California was outstanding !!! The staff was very professional and courteous.  But, I must say that Mr. Michael Williams went above and beyond in making our family feel special and memorable.  We will all be back for seconds...Thats for sure ! (:  Thank you AC Hotels
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your five-star review. Being made to feel special and memorable by one of our associates is truly what a travel experience should involve.   The goal of our team is to provide seamless thoughtful service, we will celebrate this review with Michael.   So pleased you are going to be back again with us at the AC Hotel Irvine in the future.  ¡Salud!    Paul

Summary Heading: Location is Great- Service Even Better
Summary: This is the second time I've stayed here and while I love the location for work or play, the service I have received at the front desk both times has been exceptional.  They go above and beyond to make sure you are satisfied with your stay. This is a new hotel right in the heart of everything.
Manager Response: Ray B,  Thank you for your five-star review. We really appreciate your repeat business this is one of the highest compliments we can receive.   While we are fortunate to have an amazing location in the heart Irvine. The service you enjoyed keeps our guests enjoying a friction less stay and keeps them returning. We look forward to going above and beyond again the next time your return.  ¡Salud!    Paul

Summary: Gabriela is the best worker at the hotel!!! It's very kind, communicative, fun and it's always there to help me.I've been to many hotels all over the world, but I've never come across this amount of love for a job like Gabriel.Big support for this girl !!!
Manager Response: Aleksa R,   Thank you for the five-star review. I am so glad Gabriela made in impact during your Holiday. A helpful staff removes friction and provides a harmonious experience. We will celebrate your review with her as a team.   Hope to see you again soon,  ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary: The main reason I decided to come here is because it is new, opened this year. I would stay here again in the future because of this hotel's design. Front staff is very friendly and helpful. The luggage trolley is similar to the one airport use, this is a better choice than the traditional bulky trolley. There is no carpet in the room, which is great! It has wood or wood looking tile type of flooring. Bathroom has a shower instead of a bath tube. This is a great design choice. And the drain is opposite side of where one would stand, so water doesn't puddle around one's feet. The sofa is very comfortable and can be pull out to use as another bed.
Manager Response: Thank you for the Five Star Review!   The front office team started your visit off in a friendly and helpful manner; always a great start to a friction-less stay. I am pleased to read you enjoyed the design features in the room. You touched on some of mine. The Grohe shower fixtures in our showers make for a great step in and out with modern glass enclosures. The drain placement was also a well curated design feature.   The sofa bed in all of our king rooms is made in Italy and is so comfortable and when pulled out to be used as a bed. It cradles the mattress with webbing not a traditional bar running underneath for support. This results in a great night sleep if its needed.   Look forward to welcoming you back again soon,  ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary Heading: It felt European - clean and chic!
Summary: I literally stumbled upon this hotel during a post business trip in Santa Ana - I decided to go to Newport Beach and was looking for something close. This hotel is sexy and the location is great - shopping and meals literally across the street in walking distance - like you can 'throw a rock at it' close! The bartender, Louis, is good for the atmosphere he makes great drinks:)  Love the roof pool as well and the beach was like 15 minutes away - I will stay here again - oh and the price - I couldn't believe it!
Manager Response: Epicaprille, Thank you for the five star review!  I was so excited a curator like yourself found us when looking for a hotel near Newport Beach. Our mixologist Luis has quite a following and a great secret drink menu. Be sure next time to get his Instagram account so you can follow some of his newest concoctions.   As you mentioned we have an amazing location a “rocks throw” away to great local restaurants. In a couple of months a new addition will be Puesto, serving elevated Mexican cuisine. You will only need to open our door and enter theirs; It’s adjoining the AC Hotel. Taco Tuesday will be great!  Look forward to having you back again,  ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary: I was traveling for business and was looking for a hotel close to the airport and found this one. I was impressed with my overall experience and can say I would happily stay here again.  It is a new hotel so everything is modern, clean, working and efficient. The staff were very friendly and helpful. Every interaction I had was a good one, even with the guy who checked me out at 4:30 in the morning.  The room was large and comfortable. Though I was traveling on business I could see how a family would find plenty of room for their stay. As a business traveler I found the workspace excellent, the wifi fast and reliable and the room quiet and comfortable. The bath area was very nice and the amenities were excellent. Really--I liked this place.  Location wise it is just south of the
Manager Response: Steve H,   Thank you very much for the five-star review of our new hotel.   We are so glad you found us when looking for a hotel in Irvine. We understand how removing friction from a stay such as providing strong reliable internet, a quiet comfortable room, a great location near top restaurants will make us a hotel of choice.   A great compliment was how our rooms would work for a family as well as a business traveler.   Hope to see you again soon,   ¡Salud!    Paul

Summary Heading: Modern, clean hotel for a great rate
Summary: Friendly staff, nice big modern rooms, clean, everything is new, restaurants can be found on the other side of the street, quite, park in nearby parking garage (approx 20$/night). Rates were pretty decent compared to hotels in the same area.
Manager Response: RolandV030,  Thank you for your review; We are pleased you found our modern rooms to be of a substantial size and quiet. Also, you found value as our rate was competitive to other Irvine Hotels. So many great restaurants are our direct neighbors so there is plenty of options.   Hope to see you back in Irvine soon,  ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary Heading: Felt like I was in Europe
Summary: Fantastic property.  They treat you first class.  Great area and lots of eating options.  Close to the beaches.  The staff is extremely friendly and very well trained.  We went for our anniversary but would not hesitate to stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your Five Star Review! We really appreciate you taking the time.   Congratulations on the anniversary we are honored you chose to spend the day with us. As you mentioned, our central location in the heart of Irvine is perfect proximity to the beaches, and our neighboring restaurants.   Look forward to you joining us again,   ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary: Stayed in the brand new AC hotel in Irvine for business. First stay in this brand was pleasant. Room is on the smaller side but nice staying in a hotel so new. Finishes are very nice, in particular the bathroom was well appointed. Generally speaking, felt like an extremely well done Westin, if slightly more modern. The location within Irvine is great - central, close to restaurants and office space within Park Place. The full service restaurant wasn't yet open when I stayed but that will be another added perk.
Manager Response: Jeffn545,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review. Our new modern hotel has beautiful original art that was curated by our AC design team. Its great to read you felt they were really nice and the bathroom was well appointed. The GROHE bathroom fixtures remind us of  European heritage of the brand.   The full service restaurant is called Puesto its going to be amazing, they have won numerous awards for their amazing Mexican cuisine. They are expected to open end of summer.   ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary: Stayed at the AC Hotel while traveling to Irvine for business. This new hotel is modern, well designed, and had all the high end finishes that made me feel like I was traveling for pleasure - rather than work.  The staff was fantastic and incredibly accommodating. Gabriela checked me in, gave us restaurant suggestions, and hooked up a great room. I loved the high end finishes throughout the hotel.  Marriott is really stepping it up with the AC Hotels. It felt like I was staying at a mini JW Marriott.   Plus it's close to an In N Burger about 1 mile away....so that's a plus!
Manager Response: John M,  Thank you for your Five Star Review!  Marriott is excited how the AC brand is resonating with travelers like yourself. The modern design and high touch points really make our hotel a place to unwind and connect after a long business day. Gabriella is excited she made an impact at your check in and you recognized her in your review.   With all the restaurant choices that are in the area it’s great to have the comfort of a great burger from In-N-Out.    Look forward to welcoming you back again in the future,  ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay at this elegant, modern hotel
Summary: This stay was probably my favorite hotel stay I have had this year.  Everything about the hotel, from the staff (front desk, bartender and breakfast service), amenities,  room and even location were great.  It was the cleanest, most modern hotel I've stayed in.  The breakfast entrees were very very good.  The location is about 5 minutes from John Wayne airport, next door to a LA Fitness and across the street from a fabulous Italian restaurant (North Italia).  The room definitely had that minimalistic, european vibe that I thoroughly enjoyed.  The one awkward part of the stay would have been onsite parking.  There are limited spaces in front of the hotel, so most likely you will have to park in a parking garage.  In order to leave, you'll have to get your parking ticket validated
Manager Response: Andy H, Thank you for your Five Star review!   We shared the feedback with our front office team straight away. I am glad we removed the friction from your day when our front desk staff welcomed you so well late at night. Our clean modern hotel resonates with our guests very well and it makes for a break on a traditional hotel.   Our European inspired breakfast in the AC Kitchen is a wonderful way to fuel your day; so glad you enjoyed it. As you mentioned our neighbor North Italia is amazing! I have a tough time deciding what to get, my favorite is the heirloom tomato salad and the secret is add prosciutto! The LA Fitness next door is a signature club and has tons of classes if you need more than our modern gym.   We do have the hotel key integration with parking structure on the horizon. I am sorry the experience with the tickets was not as seamless as it should be. We look to have that resolved fully in near future.  Hope to see you again when your travels bring you back to Irvine,  ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary Heading: King Balcony is weird and tiny
Summary: Upon check-in, which went smoothly, it was after 10 and had to wait a few minutes for someone from the bar to recognize that we were standing in the front desk area. She was nice enough and cordial, gave us a free upgrade parentheses gold Marriott Rewards parentheses to a king suite, with balcony. Hotel is contemporary minimalistic. Lucky enough to find the spot out front, she informed me would be $20 to park, and give me a page to stick on my Dash or mirror to show I paid. Hallways are small and dark which I like, and again very contemporary upon entering the room I was greeted by a bath sink, and the bed. Room is Tiny. Bathroom sink faces the bed there is no wall but a small separation just over the sink so the counters and closet and bathroom sink area faces the bedroom which
Manager Response: Johnny V,  Thank you for your review it was great to read your firsthand experience in one of city view, king balcony rooms; there are just six, a unique experience amongst our three room types. Trip Advisor now has pictures of all the rooms types, so future travelers will be able to see the options on line. Like you, I love the balcony as it has west facing sunset views, the apartments being built off to the side are expected to wrap up in July.   Also, I have discussed the late checkout with my front office team, we will do our best to honor the request whenever possible. We value our Marriott rewards members and extending this courtesy is something we will focus more on delivering.   I do hope you give us another opportunity in the future.   ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary Heading: New Hotel With A Modern Look
Summary: We stayed five nights at this modern facility which was just two months old.  Clean, quiet and very functional.  The office staff was polite, cheerful and helpful.  Spacious bar area, more than adequate business center and large breakfast area, but it is not free.  Quality restaurants also just across the street from the hotel.  The hotel also had a somewhat small open air swimming pool.  There is limited parking directly adjacent to the hotel and a parking garage next door.  There is a parking charge.
Manager Response: Bob  H,  Thank you for the five star review we really appreciate it!  I am so glad you chose to spend five nights in our hotel. We reviewed with our team your post and highlighted how you felt the staff was polite, cheerful, and helpful. Every moment we keep this top of mind and hope to connect with our guests so they feel at home. Especially when you are away from your home for five days.   Its great you got to enjoy the quality restaurants steps away from our hotel. There are more to come! Puesto the elevated Mexican restaurant will be opening in our hotel late July.   ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary: We decided to try the AC Hotel this weekend.  When we pulled up, the parking lot was closed due to maintenance so we had to park in the structure and lug suitcases, pack-n-play, water, etc. 100+ yards.  They didn't have any kind of valet/bell service or even a place to drop off the items.  The room was very clean, but cozy.  My kids compared it to our room on a recent cruise.  They used the available space well, but it doesn't leave much room if you need to spread out with extras.  The service was top notch, good appetizers in the bar area.  We wanted breakfast one morning, but the buffet was too exotic for kids.  We went across the street for more familiar fare.   Great hotel for a single person or couple.  Not too great for families.
Manager Response: Itsabigworld321,   Thank you so much for your review; We shared your comments to our entire team about the great service you received. This type of feedback is always excites our team.  I am sorry the parking lot resurfacing caused friction to your arrival. That is not the way we want you to feel as you settle in our hotel. It is now completed and looks fresh and new for all future arrivals.  I am glad you found the room clean with effective use of space. We shared with our AC kitchen staff the feedback you had about the good appetizers in the bar.  Our European inspired breakfast is a great option for our guests but if that does not fit your expectations. We have many more options including Starbucks steps from our hotel, I am glad you could find more familiar fare. Mothers markets has an amazing smoothie bar!   I hope your travels return you to Irvine again in the future.  ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary: Overnight trip to Orange County.  This is a new hotel from Marriott that I was unfamiliar with and decided to give a try. It is a nice modern contemporary feel. It's brand new and they are still paving the parking area. Parking is at a garage across the parking lot and costs an additional $20/night   There is a retail center with a Starbucks and some high end restaurants like Ruth Chris steakhouse and a grocery store wit cafe, LA Fitness, and food court with Lemonade and Wahoos Tacos  It's conveniently located off the 405 in an office complex with nearby residential. Safe and clean for families like all of Irvine   Pros:  Check in - fast efficient and friendly. Recognize I'm a Marriott member and status  Location - safe and convenient with nearby amenities  Shower - good strong
Manager Response: Miker422,  Thank you for the review we are glad you gave us a try; as the newest brand to the Marriott family we welcome the opportunity for guests to get to know us.   As you mentioned we are brand new and love it when people find the unexpected in our hotel. The water pitchers for guest use we call “Hydration Stations” we provide two bottles of water complimentary but this is a wonderful addition to have filtered water; perfect to keep bedside throughout your stay.  Its great you pointed out so many of our amazing neighbors! They make our destination so exciting and provide so many opportunities to enhance your experience.  ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary: Had a great time at this brand new Irvine based hotel. Staff were very welcoming and enthusiastic. The property is very clean with minimalistic design throughout which is like a breath of fresh air. The main colors are silver, light beige and dark brown which gives the hotel a warm, welcoming atmosphere and an airy, upbeat feel at the same time. Stayed four nights on a business trip. Rooms are efficient and spacious enough to get some work done. Lateral noise between rooms is noticeable as well as from the hallways. We were woken up by the morning meeting of housekeepers on our floor daily. Beds are very comfortable. The A/C unit in our room seemed to make more noise or should I say vibrations than I'd expect. Housekeeping seemed a tad too eager to please on one hand as they
Manager Response: Vincent V,  Thank you for the review; it’s great to read you felt welcomed from our enthusiastic staff. The modern décor curated by our design team really brings out the original intent of agriculture meets urban elements.   Happy you feel we are a very welcome addition to the local hotel lineup. Thank you for sharing your photo's they are great!  ¡Salud!    Paul

Summary Heading: Please Never Stay Here so the Price Doesn't Go Up!
Summary: This hotel is amazing. It's a Marriott, which a preferred hotel of my company. Many Marriotts in the Orange County area are not great, but they really got it right with AC Hotel. This is going to sound like a negative, but it's not: My first room was broken. I mean, the toilet was running, the tv didn't work, the phone didn't work, the A/C didn't work. B R O K E N. BUT! This is a BRAND NEW hotel, so things like this are expected. I do not judge a hotel on whether or not things are broken, but what they do to accommodate the customer when that stuff happens. They moved me to another room and gave me a $20 credit at the lobby bar/lounge. Everything was fine in this new room. No harm, no foul. Then, one night, they had a grand opening party in the lobby with free drinks and tapas
Manager Response: beatrix0810,  As the newest member in the Marriott family we are excited to provide an option to the modern contemporary guest looking for exceptional service. Sorry we had some opportunity in your first room and will address internally.   Turning around the friction of the opening event into a positive one for you is what our team looks to do throughout a guests stay. We will share this review with Jason as this level of service illustrates exactly what we strive for on a daily basis.  Thank you for the five star review, we look forward to welcoming you on your return visits.   ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary: Jason P. @ AC Hotel Irvine was exceptionally helpful in changing my reservation for an extended stay. He went out of his way to make certain all options were addressed.  Due to his extra effort, the reservation adjustment was successful and at a very competitive price.   Thank you Jason P.
Manager Response: Flightdeckadvisor,  Thank you so much for the five-star review; we appreciate your extended stay. Our brand-new rooms are a perfect place to stay. Along with our location in the heart of Irvine you will have plenty of options. Jason P. will appreciate your kind words we will be sure to share as a team.    ¡Salud!    Paul

Summary: I like the intimacy of the room and the balcony. The European feel was fresh, the hotel is relatively new. There is construction and new developments surrounding the property. The hotel employees were all gracious. I'm over 6 feet so the rooms were a little small, but its a gem in one of my favorite cities. Very close to attractions, affordable rates, safe and convenient to lots of shopping options as well.
Manager Response: KENYATTA S,  Happy belated birthday!  Glad, you enjoyed our gracious service, a harmonious frictionless stay is what we focus on providing. Irvine is known as Americas Safest Big City and a wonderful place to visit. A perfect choice to celebrate a birthday.  ¡Salud!    Paul

Summary Heading: Everyone should be staying at this hotel
Summary: The first thing I noticed was the cool modern  atmosphere of this hotel as soon as i  walked into the lobby. The very next thing with the customer service, which was five star from every person I dealt with. Front desk, Bartender, housekeeping, and I even got a nice email from the general manager asking how my stay was. I was there for three nights for a lacrosse tournament in town and I got the feeling that the hotel was more of a business hotel but it's so conveniently located to everything in Irvine. We walked to get food across the street there were 10 different options I got my hair blown out at the blowdry salon   I went for a run and although there's a lot of construction in the neighborhoodit I felt safe and it was never very disruptive. I even laid out at the pool and
Manager Response: GINGER A,  Thank you for the great five-star review and selecting the AC Hotel Irvine. Choosing which excellent restaurant to walk in itself is half the challenge. The blowout bar for hair is very popular before a night out on the town. There is also a wonderful place in on our campus for a message or even a quick tan.   AC Hotels is part of the Marriott family and is growing very quickly with 23 now in the United Sates and 110 expected by 2020.   ¡Salud!    Paul

Summary: My fiancee and I spent a weekend here and it was amazing. The design is beautiful. The amenities are of very high quality; an exemplary shower and bed. The staff was always smiling and courteous. We were able to experience the cocktail lounge and had the pleasure of meeting Luis, a top notch mixologist! The overall vibe and feel of the hotel is amazing. We loved it and didn't want to leave.
Manager Response: Katteeb,  Thank you for the five-star review, and congratulations on your engagement. Meeting Luis is always great, he is there five nights a week ready to use his mixology skills to find you a perfect drink.   Glad, you loved the vibe and feel of the hotel. Our contemporary modern hotel is designed to do provide you an escape and place to recharge.   ¡Salud!    Paul

Summary Heading: The Wonderful Hotel Experience to Remember...
Summary: After a long work week, I decided to get away to relax in the beautiful city of Irvine. I am happy that I decided to stay at AC Irvine where the experience was nothing less than extraordinary. From the initial greeting of the front desk staff, specifically, Devine, who went the extra mile to ensure that my stay was second to none. Devine ensured that I had a clear understanding of all the amenities at the hotel as well as the resources for the guests. It is one thing that the hotel is aesthetically pleasing but it makes it the best experience when the staff also make you feel welcome and special. The rooms are neat and comfortable. The lobby area is ideal to enjoy a nice time relaxing and having a cocktail. The location of the hotel is also great as there are great restaurants
Manager Response: Lisseth L,  Thank you so much for the kind five-star review. Devin is such an ambassador for our hotel and we will be sure to share your feedback with him and the team.  Its great you had a comfortable room, and felt so welcomed.   The great restaurants on our campus are perfect extensions of the elevated experience our guests expect.   Look forward to a return trip in the future  ¡Salud!   Paul

Summary: My friends and I had the pleasure of coming down to AC Hotel Irvine for my birthday last month. We knew the hotel had just opened and were excited to visit. We were not disappointed. Upon arrival, the evening team of Michael and Jason greeted us as if we were regulars. Amazing attitudes, smooth check-in, and assumed service. They made sure we were taken care of before we even got to the room. Jason followed up with a call, which was a very nice touch. Michael also sent a welcome email later that evening which made us feel like we were taken care of. Fast service on all requests, they even gave us an extra chair to accommodate our group. Housekeeping did an amazing job servicing the room throughout our stay. Shout out to Luis for recommendations on how to enjoy our Friday night.
Manager Response: Thank you Cisenberg, for the 5 star review you have shared with the trip advisor community.   Michael and Jason love to share our core believes of exceptional thoughtful service. Enjoying a great weekend is the perfect way to unwind from all the stresses of life. As you are aware our Irvine location is centrally located to all the best Orange County has to offer.   We look forward to your return visit at another time.   Paul

Summary: I started staying at the AC Hotel the second week they were open and have stayed here three nights every week. I LOVE this hotel. They recognize me when I come in, store my toiletries weekly, and generally acknowledge my regular patronage. The only challenge has been negotiating a preferred rate for my weekly visits, which will continue for the next year, at a minimum. For a guaranteed 100 nights/year, they will not guarantee my preferred rate on Tues-Wed, and the preferred rate is higher than the Marriott Rewards Member rate available through Marriott directly. Makes no sense to me.
Manager Response: Lauralea T,   The highest compliment you can extend our team is your return patronage. Its great you love our hotel and our associates recognize you upon your return.  I am sorry we have provided some friction into booking return visits. If you could direct message me your contact information. I would be sure to review the matter with our Sales team as soon as possible.   Thank you,   Paul

Summary: Would never have known this property was only open for a month prior to my stay.  Place was immaculate, rooms were clean and modern, gym was great, location convenient with a multitude of food options and the service was top-notch, over the top.  Kudos to all, especially Tambra who helped me with a tablet I left behind.  After providing my cc info for shipping with another employee, she called me back to make sure that I was comfortable with the cost.  Great customer service!  Already booked my next stay mid may.  Give this place a try, they will not disappoint.
Manager Response: smp1022,   Thank you very much for the 5 star review. I am so glad Tambra made the experience of returning the tablet seamless; service should need not end once you depart from our hotel.   We are so pleased you enjoyed our modern rooms and central location in the heart of Irvine. The team will be here to provide you exceptional service again, upon your return in Mid May.    ¡Salud!  Paul

Summary: Stayed here twice, including just after opening, and found it refreshingly different from other hotels in the area. The rooms, while on the small side, are sleek and well-designed, using ceramic floor tile instead of the usual carpet. The fixtures and lighting work well. Service staff smile a lot and the $16 breakfast is Euro-style with cheeses, tapas-style eggs, and spanish ham sliced for you. Parking is often across the road in the parking structure but not too far away and free.
Manager Response: JWBklyn,  It is such a compliment to hear you have stayed with us twice in such a brief period of time. We appreciate your review and support of the AC Irvine.  A friendly staff can remove friction from the day and our team strives to do just that. Our refreshingly different take on hotel design is one hallmarks of the AC brand and we are glad you enjoyed it.   We look forward to providing more smiles in the future.   ¡Salud!  Paul

Summary Heading: AC Hotel Irvine - "Outstnding Service and Atmosphere"
Summary: I didn't know when I booked my reservation, for a business trip, that the AC Hotel Irvine had only been open for a month and that was a pleasant surprise to the start of my stay.  Now the experience I had was nothing short of spectacular.  The staff is courteous and friendly with a little bit of an edge, as you might expect in an AC property, and added to my overall experience. The rooms are spacious and well appointed, the lobby and lounge beautiful and edgy, a great hotel to stay in whether traveling on business or pleasure...  In my opinion a must experience property when you are in the area... Well done TEAM AC and thank you for making my stay a memorable one!!!   Six Stars oh sorry I can only give you Five
Manager Response: robertlJ6904KI,  Thank you so much for the five-star review. It has been an incredible month, we are so excited about the great feedback we have had in the brief time. Our staff is excited to share all the touch points that differentiate ourselves and define the AC experience.  Salud!   Paul

Summary: This has become one of my favorite properties I have ever been to. The hotel itself is impeccable. Beautiful European design, modern and minimal rooms, great pool deck and gym. The European breakfast with the fresh croissants and meats and cheeses are fantastic, the drinks in the lounge were really great too. But as amazing as all that was, the one thing that made this hotel really special for me was the staff. Everyone I came across was friendly and professional. One person in particular that stood out to me was Chris at the front desk. Chris really made my stay special. My girlfriend and I came in before check in time hoping we could get a room for our weekend getaway early and chris was amazingly professional and kindly got us a room and even comped us 2 free drinks when he
Manager Response: traveladdict808,  The five-star review is appreciated. I am so glad you met Chris, he is always eager to exceed our guest’s expectations and a notable example of the personalized service our associates deliver. The breakfast is European inspired and the freshly sliced prosciutto is a great signature item.   We hope you join us again in the future,   -Paul

Summary: My wife and I recently stayed at the AC Hotel Irvine. What a wonderful hotel with a very attentive and friendly staff. I highly recommend this hotel.  We decided to do a quick weekend getaway and had heard good things about this hotel brand. Those good things were confirmed during our stay. We arrived early on a beautiful Friday afternoon to a contemporary and sharp looking hotel exterior. The interior upon entering the lobby carried the same contemporary-modern vibe along with a surprisingly welcoming feel. We were warmly greeted by Chris at the front desk and despite our early arrival he was able to provide us with a room on a higher floor as requested. The check in was seamless and Chris was professional and friendly.  I was surprised at how much I liked our room. It was not
Manager Response: Frank M,   Thank you for the five star review. It’s great that our location lends itself to a perfect weekend getaway. Walking distance to top dining, local trail for walking/hiking, and the LA Fitness Signature Club. Some of our guests love the health food market “mothers” also steps from our hotel.   We look forward to welcoming you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great new addition to the area
Summary: I had been looking forward to staying here since February when I found out about the new property.  I am a Marriott loyalist and was interested in seeing what the AC Hotel brand was all about.  Prior reviews mention "minimalist" decor and I was expecting a mattress on the floor type thing from reading that comment in so many reviews.  Room highlights: * Functional and comfortable (the bed).  The office chair was somewhat odd since it was just a regular chair without wheels, and I'm used to seeing a typical office chair with wheels. * No dresser, at least in my room.  Rather there is room in the closet and a long bench in the living area to place clothing.  This made a lot of sense to me since I don't usually put my clothes in a dresser and rather lay it out on a bed (if there is
Manager Response: rafa d,   We enjoyed reading your great review of our guest rooms! We are so pleased you enjoyed the contemporary styling and you found it warm and uncluttered. Each room does have a mini-refrigerator so you can store some items throughout your stay. We also have two bottles of complementary water for your convenience.    As a Marriott property, it’s great to experience a new way to hotel, while enjoying the benefits of earning points to use throughout the Marriott family.  Hope your travels return you to the AC soon.

Summary: The team at this brand new hotel including Chris, Gabriella, Jason, Devin were a great help to my folks who stayed there over the weekend. The switched rooms to help get us disability across room and made my parents stay very comfortable. So pleased with the service and the European design. Also, had a great happy hour snack menu that I plan to try when I need to escape for a couple days! Thank you for being so accommodating - really enjoyed this hotel and the AC team.
Manager Response: SarahInLB, thank you for your 5 star review!   The AC Design team has focused on creating a modern contemporary hotel that represents Irvine at its core of design. The associates you mentioned are what really matters to creating a seamless stay. I am so glad we made your parents very comfortable.   Our location in the heart of Irvine, steps from some of the best restaurants in Orange County make us a perfect weekend "staycation" or place to escape.  So many choice's with North Italia, Ruth's Chris Steakhouse, and Houston's to mention a few. We look forward to welcoming you back!     On behalf of the AC team,   Salud!   Paul

Summary Heading: Great new hotel in the OC
Summary: This is a great new hotel in the OC!  I arrived after a long day of travel.  The front desk crew immediately offered assistance and were very kind and helpful!  Rooms modern and beautifully appointed.  Little extras (bottled water etc) pricey but thats how it is these days...Breakfast was also delicious.  Good option for a Marriott property!
Manager Response: MelissaValencia_CA your five star review is appreciated.  I  am so happy  the front desk team made a memorable impact after a long day of travel. Our job is take the friction from your day and allow you to focus on what brings you to Irvine, either business or pleasure. I am so glad you enjoyed the European style breakfast; food that fuels your day always is a great start.   We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!   Paul

Summary: This is a lovely new property that is trying a very hard to be European with the modular furniture, small rooms and layout. Everything is within arm or leg’s reach from the bed. EVERYTHING. Seriously, I could jump from the shower to the bed without touching the floor. it hard for me to recommend this for a couple.  When you enter the room (as with many non-US hotels) you have to insert the key into the wall unit for the electricity to work. Not a problem, unless you check in at 9 PM, in the dark. I almost dropped my phone and nearly slammed my hand in the very heavy door fumbling for my phone’s flashlight while trying to wrangle my baggage in the dark.   As I said, the rooms are small and have an interesting set up. The toilet has its own room with a glass door and
Manager Response: The_Doyenne, thank you for the posting we always value feedback from our travelers. We have some wonderful balcony rooms with a residential studio configuration. The balcony allows guests to enjoy the sunset views after a long day while feeling the breeze.   I  hope next time you might enjoy one of our standard king rooms that has a bathroom area that is separated from the bedroom space. It would be great to compare the two and see which one you prefer. We also appreciate your feedback about the lighting and will work to a better solution.   Thank you again for feedback,   Paul

Summary: I had drinks with some business associates and we had the pleasure of being served by Clinton. It was a wonderful experience and he was very attentive to us. Also was greeted by Paul the manager whoo gave us a tour of the facility. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the area. Great service and wonderful people working for this hotel
Manager Response: lorettapollack, We love how Clinton connected with you while enjoying the AC Lounge, the lounge is a perfect place to enjoy a signature Gin and Tonic or a delicious Tapas plate. Some guests love to sip a glass of wine and enjoy a book from the AC library. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: I came into the AC hotel today just to take a look at the lobby.  I've heard some great things about the hotel since the day that it opened and I have to say: I was quite impressed! Upon entering the building, I was warmly greeted by a well-groomed desk clerk named Devin who made my day by making me feel so welcomed.  He was quite pleasant and welcoming.  The first thing that grabbed my attention was the bar which had an inviting ambiance.  The lobby itself is quite large and has a spectacular interior design.  The seating, although chic, was pleasant and comfortable.  I was greeted by a few members of the staff, all of whom were friendly and professional.  I have yet to spend a night there, but I do plan to do so soon.
Manager Response: Shanel d, we are so pleased you got to meet Devin he loves to show guests around the hotel and all the special moments that are in store for our guests. We look forward to seeing you again so you can take advantage of all the hotel amenities.

Summary Heading: Greater service alomg with a great hotel makes it greatest
Summary: Night shift manager Michael Williams will simply go above and beyond to make sure your stay at this hotel would be one of your most amazing experiences you've had at any Marriott line and especially at the brand spanking new AC Hotel Irvine.. thanks much!
Manager Response: Thank you very much Entertaingself for the review. Michael has an infectious smile and is such an asset to our evening team. Its great when an associate connects with you and leaves an impression. Hope to see you back in Irvine soon.

Summary: This is a beautiful new property. The staff is friendly and welcoming. Michael at the front desk checked us in, was very kind and personable and remembered us throughout our 5 day stay. The hotel is clean, fresh and comfortable. I would definitely recommend his hotel and stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review juliemaire, we are so pleased to see you enjoyed your stay to the new AC Hotel Irvine. We are so excited to introduce the AC Hotel to the amazing city of Irvine. I am so glad you got to meet Michael and experience his passion for service.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Great Customer Service, Friendly Staff, and Facilities
Summary: I have to say what a wonderful stay I have had these two days already (out of 5 nights) here at AC Hotel Irvine. Marriott did a nice job of building this hotel as well as very close proximity to the airport, my company headquarters, and across the street dining. Hopefully, if I have to come back, I get booked here.   Big thanks to Chris Carter during check-in and follow-up and Michael Williams for great hospitality, friendliness, and coffee in the early morning. Thank you guys so much!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review, located in the heart of Irvine we are steps away from some of the best dining options in the city. Its so great to hear our location worked so well for business and pleasure. Our associates are amazing, Chris and Michael represent the spirit of our service culture. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: I actually found the AC Hotel by accident. I left my original hotel because I was so displeased but, boy am I glad I did! When I looked up the AC property all that I could tell was that it was new and had to be better than where I had been the night before, and it SO was!   We were welcomed so nicely by pleasant staff and the lobby was exquisitely designed. As I was checking in, they informed us that this was opening weekend and we were some of the first to stay at this new boutique brand of Marriott. This AC Hotel is one of the first few of its type to come to the United States. How cool! We felt special!   The rooms were very pleasant and featured a very minimalist and clean line design, which I enjoyed. Each room features smart TV's (Hulu, Netflix, You Tube, etc.), a unique
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you found our hotel on its opening weekend! Our associates are so excited to extend the service culture that represents the foundation of Antonio Catalan's vision of the AC Hotel brand. Even better you found one of our "smoked" cocktails that are "off the menu". We look forward extending our hospitality again to you in the future.

Summary: I had a pleasure of being one of the first hotel guest to experience the AC Hotel located at 3309 Michelson Dr. Irvine Ca 92612. The staff was amazing and very hospitable. I want to give a special thanks to the front desk associates Michael, Eli, Christopher and Devin for making my family stay great.
Manager Response: Marie M, thank you for our first review, we are honored to receive a 5 star review and will look to build upon this experience. Our associates are so excited to share their passion for service and showcase our beautiful property to all that visit. The front desk team is especially proud of how they made your family stay great.
